item.title: Rubbish left here for months !, 1st November
item.description:
Se18 5SG - Cambridge Barracks Road. On the wall and on the floor there is bin bags, air fryers, heater and a broken TV left there. This has not been cleaned for at least 8 months. We need it fixed urgently please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cambridge Barracks Road, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant parking on double yellow lines outside restaurants blocking corner of junction, 1st November
item.description:
We have reported the problem numerous times that the parking on the corner on double yellow lines happens every evening causing it to be very dangerous to get in and out of the road, needs to be monitored regularly to ticket them as problem out of control now with takeaway delivery’s
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Avery Hill Road, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped fridge and pallet, 1st November
item.description:
This has been here for weeks and has been reported few times on fix my street , the flat above pizza hot 4 u is air BnB recently and constantly put bin bags too around bin and foxes shred all over roads

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Avery Hill Road, New Eltham, London

item.title: Faeces (likely human) in staircase, 1st November
item.description:
There’s faeces that looks very human in the staircase of blandford court on the St Peter’s way side. This is not the first time this happened around the estate. Please can this be cleaned up and preventative measures taken

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Peters Way, Hackney, London

item.title: Fly tipping, 1st November
